title: Mobile-Based Math Microlearning Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Basic mathematics proficiency enhancement course for solving daily-life problems in smartphone-only access environments. Learners are working professionals studying outside work hours

learning_goals: Learners complete over 90% of 5-minute microlearning content provided via a smartphone app within two weeks.
At the end of the course, learners can apply three basic equations for solving real-life problems (e.g., discounted purchases, budget calculations) with 80% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate interaction skills by exchanging questions and feedback at least once a week in mobile discussion forums with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
